attributes.action: make it easier for British nationals who are married to international partners.
attributes.background:
I am living in Mexico City with my wife who is Mexican. The only way we could be together was for me
 to come to Mexico and get married. It is far too difficult to get married in the uk due to all the rules and costs involved. I would like to bring my wife and her kids back to uk but unable to

rejection.details:
Petitions need to contain a clear statement explaining what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take.

It seems from your petition that you believe that it is too difficult for a British national to get married in the UK to someone who is not British. If that is the case, you could start a petition asking for specific changes to the rules or costs.
